item.title: CAPT PITOT and F/O PITOT HEAT Indicating Systems (Heater OFF Monitor)

remarks.para: Except for ER operations beyond 120 minutes, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Remaining probe heater indicating systems for operative probe heaters are operative, and
Aircraft is not operated into known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: No flight in known or forecast icing conditions.

numlitem.para: Operations in known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "CAPT (F/O) PITOT HEATER OFF INDICATION INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
